data.quote: It’s not the will to win that matters — everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.
data.author: Paul Bryant

data.quote: I’ve failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
data.author: Derek Jeter

data.quote: The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer.
data.author: John Madden

data.quote: To uncover your true potential you must first find your own limits and then you have to have the courage to blow past them.
data.author: Picabo Street

data.quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
data.author: Mike Singletary

data.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
data.author: Satchel Paige

data.quote: It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters.
data.author: Evander Holyfield

data.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
data.author: Phil Jackson

data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
data.author: Tim Notke

data.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
data.author: Dean Karnazes

data.quote: What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
data.author: Andre Agassi

data.quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
data.author: Jim Valvano

data.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: When you’ve got something to prove, there’s nothing greater than a challenge.
data.author: Terry Bradshaw
